result.markdown:
# Problem 5 {.unnumbered} ::: {.callout-note icon=false} ## Problem

$2520$ is the smallest number that can be divided by each of the numbers from $1$ to $10$ without any remainder.

What is the smallest positive number that is evenly divisibledivisible with no remainder by all of the numbers from $1$ to $20$?

::: ### Julia (using lcm) ::: {.cell execution_count=1} ``` {.julia .cell-code} p5() = lcm(1:20...); p5() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ``` 232792560 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=2} ``` {.julia .cell-code} using BenchmarkTools; @benchmark p5() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3} ::: {.ansi-escaped-output} ```{=html} 
BenchmarkTools.Trial: 10000 samples with 1000 evaluations.
 Range (min … max):  1.132 ns … 3.647 ns  ┊ GC (min … max): 0.00% … 0.00%
 Time  (median):     1.142 ns             ┊ GC (median):    0.00%
 Time  (mean ± σ):   1.140 ns ± 0.038 ns  ┊ GC (mean ± σ):  0.00% ± 0.00%
  ▁                                                  █       
  █▁▁▁▁▃▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁█▁▁▁▁▄ ▂
  1.13 ns        Histogram: frequency by time       1.14 ns <
 Memory estimate: 0 bytes, allocs estimate: 0.
``` ::: ::: ::: ### Julia ::: {.cell execution_count=3} ``` {.julia .cell-code} include("euler.jl") function prime_decomposition(n::Integer) possible_primes = Euler.sieve_of_eratosthenes(n) temp_n = n dec = Int32[] while temp_n > 1 for p ∈ possible_primes q, r = divrem(temp_n, p) if iszero(r) temp_n = temp_n ÷ p push!(dec, p) break end end end return dec end; function p5() decomposition = map(prime_decomposition, 2:20) distinct_primes = vcat(decomposition...) |> unique count_matrix = map(distinct_primes) do p map(decomposition) do d count(==(p), d) end end |> stack primes_powers = map(maximum, eachcol(count_matrix)) n = (distinct_primes .^ primes_powers) |> prod return n end; p5() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4} ``` 232792560 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=4} ``` {.julia .cell-code} using BenchmarkTools; @benchmark p5() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=5} ::: {.ansi-escaped-output} ```{=html}
